title: Janssen Expands the EXPLORER Global Cardiovascular Research Program with Three New Studies Evaluating XARELTO® in Patients at Risk for Venous Thromboembolism
author: Emily Mullin
description: RARITAN, N.J., March 31, 2014 /PRNewswire/ -- Janssen Research & Development, LLC (Janssen) announced today it is adding three new clinical trials to its EXPLORER global cardiovascular research... | RARITAN, N.J., March 31, 2014 /PRNewswire/ -- Janssen Research & Development, LLC (Janssen) announced today it is adding three new clinical trials to its EXPLORER global cardiovascular research...
